flavorText: While Lazav schemed and Niv-Mizzet researched, Trostani sought the future in the whispers of the past.

foreignData.flavorText: Während Lazav intrigierte und Niv-Mizzet forschte, suchte Trostani die Zukunft im Flüstern der Vergangenheit.
foreignData.name: Ruhige Erinnerung
foreignData.text: Mische die Ruhige Erinnerung und bis zu drei Karten deiner Wahl aus genau einem Friedhof in die Bibliothek ihrer Besitzer.

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras Lazav planeaba y Niv-Mízzet investigaba, Trostani buscó el futuro en los susurros del pasado.
foreignData.name: Reminiscencia serena
foreignData.text: Baraja la Reminiscencia serena y hasta tres cartas objetivo de un mismo cementerio en las bibliotecas de sus propietarios.

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que Lazav complotait et que Niv-Mizzet poursuivait ses recherches, Trostani sondait l'avenir dans les échos du passé.
foreignData.name: Remembrance sereine
foreignData.text: Mélangez la Remembrance sereine et jusqu'à trois cartes ciblées d'un cimetière unique dans les bibliothèques de leurs propriétaires.

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre Lazav tramava e Niv-Mizzet conduceva le sue ricerche, Trostani cercava il futuro nei sussurri del passato.
foreignData.name: Ricordo Sereno
foreignData.text: Rimescola il Ricordo Sereno e fino a tre carte bersaglio da un unico cimitero nei grimori dei rispettivi proprietari.

foreignData.flavorText: ラザーヴが計画を練り、ニヴ＝ミゼットが調査をする間、トロスターニは過去の囁きから未来を見通そうとしていた。
foreignData.name: 静寂なる想起
foreignData.text: 単一の墓地にあるカードを最大３枚まで対象とし、静寂なる想起とそれらをオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。

foreignData.flavorText: 라자브가 음모를 꾸미고 니브-미젯이 연구하는 동안 트로스타니는 과거의 속삭임에서 미래를 찾아 헤맸다.
foreignData.name: 고요한 추모
foreignData.text: 한 무덤에 있는 카드를 최대 세 장까지 목표로 정한다. 고요한 추모와 그 카드들을 각각 소유자의 서고에 넣고 섞는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto Lazav tramava e Niv-Mizzet pesquisava, Trostani buscava o futuro nos sussurros do passado.
foreignData.name: Lembrança Serena
foreignData.text: Embaralhe Lembrança Serena e até três cards alvo de um único cemitério nos grimórios de seus donos.

foreignData.flavorText: Пока Лазав строил козни, а Нив-Миззет проводил исследования, Тростани вслушивалась в будущее в шепоте прошлого.
foreignData.name: Ясные Воспоминания
foreignData.text: Втасуйте Ясные Воспоминания и не более трех целевых карт из одного кладбища в библиотеки их владельцев.

foreignData.flavorText: 拉札夫精心计划，尼米捷研究调查，卓塔妮则在过去的细语中探索未来。
foreignData.name: 缅怀
foreignData.text: 将缅怀和至多三张目标在同一坟墓场的牌洗入其拥有者的牌库。

foreignData.flavorText: 拉札夫精心計劃，尼米捷研究調查，卓塔妮則在過去的細語中探索未來。
foreignData.name: 緬懷
foreignData.text: 將緬懷和至多三張目標在同一墳墓場的牌洗入其擁有者的牌庫。

name: Serene Remembrance
originalText: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.

rulings.text: You may choose zero targets when you cast Serene Remembrance. If you do, you’ll shuffle Serene Remembrance into its owner’s library when it resolves.

If you choose at least one target for Serene Remembrance, and all of its targets are illegal when Serene Remembrance tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t shuffle any library and Serene Remembrance will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

If you give Serene Remembrance the flashback ability and cast it from your graveyard, it will be exiled instead of being shuffled into your library. Any other targets will still be shuffled into their owners’ library, however.

text: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.
